ovdesc.p: This application is mainly used by the Internet Banking user and helps in creating a list of securities to be monitored closely.By creating a watchlist, user can track the security related information like price movements, price change graph.

desc.p: It is a free text field and user can give information like reasons for monitoring the security.
Specifies the security number. This is a Multi value field.

1-6 numeric character Security number separated from a 3 numeric character suffix by "-". or 3-10 type MNE (uppercase alpha or numeric or ".") character Mnemonic Security id.Must be the ID of a valid SECURITY.MASTER file record.
